articles.description: Baltimore cut the former Alabama All-American, but the Ravens coach doesn’t think the running back is through.
articles.content: Former Alabama All-American Mark Ingram cleared NFL waivers on Wednesday and became a free agent, no longer a member of the Baltimore Ravens after two seasons of endearing himself to the teams fans a… [+4124 chars]

articles.title: Zinedine Zidane's awkward reaction as Real Madrid sent packing from Cup by minnows - Mirror Online
articles.description: Zidane faced fresh questions over his future after the La Liga giants suffered an embarrasing Copa del Rey exit - and the Real Madrid manager's reaction was slammed on Twitter
articles.content:
Zinedine Zidane's reaction didn't look good after Real Madrid suffered a humiliating Copa del Rey exit - as pressure on the manager intensified.
